area: a horizontal earthen or sandy surface within a 20-foot burst
markdown:
**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 110 2.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) **Spell Lists** [Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5) **Deities** [Anubis](/Deities.aspx?ID=49), [Yamatsumi](/Deities.aspx?ID=185) **Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Range** 30 feet **Area** a horizontal earthen or sandy surface within a 20-foot burst **Duration** sustained up to 1 minute --- You cause the surface to heave. The area becomes difficult terrain and any tracks in the area are destroyed by the churning ground. Creatures standing in the area take a –1 status penalty to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) and [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29) and Athletics checks to [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) and [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37). The first time each round you Sustain the Spell, you can move the churning area up to 10 feet in any direction. Creatures [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) by the spell are carried along with the shifting sand in the same direction, if possible; this movement is [forced movement](/Rules.aspx?ID=451). Creatures that enter or begin their turn standing in the shifting sand must attempt a Reflex save. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected and ignores the area’s difficult terrain and penalty to skill checks until the end of its turn.
**Success** The creature ignores the area’s penalty to skill checks until the end of its turn.
**Failure** The creature is affected normally by the spell this turn.
**Critical Failure** The creature becomes [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) within the spell’s area until it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79). If the creature was already immobilized by shifting sands, it also falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). --- **Heightened (5th)** The status penalty increases to –2 and the spell’s range increases to 60 feet. **Heightened (7th)** The status penalty increases to –3, the spell’s range increases to 60 feet, and the spell’s area increases to a 30-foot burst. **Heightened (9th)** The status penalty increases to –4, the spell’s range increases to 60 feet, and the spell’s area increases to a 40-foot burst.
